title: $1,485 / 1br - 900ft2 -Spacious & Spotless 1 Bedrm apt.-great location
description:
$1,485 / 1br - 900ft2 - Spacious & Spotless 1 Bedrm apartment -great location
In Riddle Glen Condominiums (1016 W. Baltimore Pike). This is a spotless, great condition, nine hundred square foot, one bedroom/one bath apartment.   It features amazing luxury vinyl plank floors throughout, an updated kitchen with granite countertops and backsplash, and new appliances. Layout is a combo Living Room/Dining Room, large bedroom, and full tile bath.
This is a ground floor unit (extra windows!) with sliding glass doors to a private patio that offers direct access to the adjacent parking spaces.  The apartment is in a quaint, quiet, beautifully-maintained and well-landscaped community.
It's just 1.5 miles from popular and trendy downtown Media, PA. and I-476.  You can walk to the brand new Promenade at Granite Run mall, Acme, Kohls, restaurants, a fitness center, and Riddle Hospital.
Three bus routes make it a short ride to Media trolley stops or the Media/Elwyn train to Center City. Rent includes heat and hot water.  There is a large, private storage closet and a laundry facility a few steps away.
No pets and no smoking, please.  Good credit and proof of income are required.
Please email your phone number and a good time to call you if you're interested.

title: WOW! Fantastic E Passyunk LOCA! RENOVATED "Studio 1 Bdrm" PICS!
description:
** Interested in seeing this apartment, possibly even on short notice? Email us from this listing, or (especially for short notice requests) text or call  show contact info
. **
** This apartment is in a fantastic location just off E Passyunk Avenue! **
** It recently benefited from a MAJOR RENOVATION, including the addition of an ALL-NEW CUSTOM KITCHEN & beautiful HICKORY HARDWOOD FLOORING throughout! **
** Pictures are current now. Painting prep is underway; the entire apartment will be freshly re-painted before you move in. See this unit now! **
** We consider this apt a "studio one-bedroom". There's a combined living room/kitchen space, a full bedroom + bathroom (w/shower). If you don't have much living room furniture, that's good! The bedroom is good sized with two closets. **
** Accepting leases starting as early as April 16 and as late as May 16. **
** Interested in seeing this apartment, possibly on short notice? Please email or call us from this listing. We'll try to accommodate your schedule. **
** This is a one-bedroom efficiency apartment (ie a full one-bedroom + a combined living room/kitchen space). **
1809 S 13th St #1
E Passyunk Ave/Italian Market, Philadelphia
Located in one of the city's hottest areas JUST around the corner from E Passyunk Ave, this one-bedroom apartment has been renovated! Featuring hickory hardwood flooring, kitchen countertop/island, gas stove & more, 1809 S 13th #1 is located on a quiet main street block just around the corner from great brick-oven pizza at Marra's, sumptuous brunches at Roselena's Cafe, trendy Mex w/killer margaritas at Cantina Los Caballitos, new mod-Asian Gabriella's Vietnam, upscale designer shopping, and more!
Monthly Rent:	$1275
Utilities: Gas & electric on your own bill; water included.
Initial Payment: 1st, Last & Security
Pets: Cats OK w/Pet Addendum and Deposit.
Lease Agreement: 1 Year Lease required, then month-to-month w/a Winter term
The property: 1809 S 13th Street originally was a single-family dwelling, subsequently converted to a two-unit building. Walk up the exterior stairs of this traditional Philadelphia townhouse & unlock the front door into a common vestibule. From here, the private entrance to your unit is immediately on the right.
The apartment -- Living Room/Kitchen: Enter directly into a cozy living room with new solid Hickory wood flooring. The space gets lots of light from a large 6' wide front window; the window features interior mini-blinds and a vintage exterior front awning. A corner kitchen with island countertop includes a gas stove, full refrigerator, 18" dishwasher & 2 rows of new modern white, aluminum & glass cabinets for storage.
The apartment -- Bedroom & Bath: The apartment has a surprisingly spacious bedroom, again with new Hickory hardwood flooring. The vintage 60s-style fully-tiled bathroom is in great condition; it has a walk-in shower & has upgraded light fixtures. Closets? There are 2 full bedroom closets for storage! And from the bedroom, you have EXCLUSIVE access to your own backyard patio (recently resurfaced and re-fenced) for barbequing, container gardening, etc.
The basement: Accessible by keyed entry through a separate entrance at the front of the building, this common space includes a coin-op washing machine & dryer.
The area: East Passyunk Ave is one of the hottest residential areas in Philadelphia, providing access to new hip & upscale restaurants & boutiques within an "old world" Philadelphia neighborhood. Prefer shopping for used records/cds or skateboard gear? All of these options & more are within a couple blocks of your apartment. The area is great for walking; you're just 5 minutes from famous cheesesteaks at Pat's or Geno's in the Italian Market & 10 minutes to South Street. Traveling to center city or points north or west? Drive your own car & you'll be at city hall in less than 10 minutes. Or catch the Broad Street Subway; there's a station just a few short blocks away.
For more info & to schedule an appointment to see this property, please contact us from this listing.

title: $2,550 / 2br - 1200ft2 - Sansom Garden Estates Trinity Home
description:
New 15-month lease starting May 1st 2023 to August 1st 2024 (or also available for sublet starting May 1st 2023 through July 26th 2023) for a 2-bed, 2.5-bath historic, Mediterranean-style, Rittenhouse trinity home  located in the historic Sansom Garden Estates for $2,550+ utilities by 21st and Sansom.
The first floor has a living room with a decorative fireplace, a smaller kitchen, and a shared courtyard out the back door. The second floor has a bedroom with two closets, a hallway closet, and a full ensuite bathroom with a linen closet (4 total closets). The second floor also has French doors and a Juliette balcony. The third floor has two closets, an ensuite bathroom with a linen closet (3 total closets and a slightly larger footprint overall than the second floor bedroom). The basement has plenty of storage space, a half bath, utility sink, and new, full-size washer and dryer units.
This unit is eligible for street permit parking for $50/year. Finding street parking typically takes 5-10 minutes but may take longer at rush hour.
I attached pictures of the bedrooms empty and furnished. The third floor is shown furnished two different ways.
This central location is extremely convenient and accessible to a variety of places yet feels more residential/insulated as it's located just off Sansom along a more private brick path. It's a 5-min walk to the Schuykill River Trail, 5-min walk from Trader Joe's, <10 min walk from 30th Street Station, <10-min walk from Cira Green rooftop park, 5-min walk from Rittenhouse Square Park, 2-min walk from Alchemy coffee shop, 2-min walk from Monde Market deli and convenience store, and more. The neighbors are wonderful!
Renters insurance is required. Tenant pays water, electric, and gas. Water is usually around $35/person/month. Gas is used for oven, water heater, dryer, and heat. Gas tends to be ~<$50-$60 for the entire house in summer for 2 people from May to October, $100 in Spring and Fall, and highest in winter, nearing ~$300 max in the coldest month. Electric follows a similar pattern but in the reverse. Electric is ~$45 in winter and is closer to $200 in summer with ~$230 for the hottest month. Rent includes pest maintenance and trash.
Willing to sell/ leave some furniture.

title: Bathrooms are Stunning and include wide-plank Flooring
description: Luxurious 2-Bedroom Apartment in Poplar Available now - This 2-Bedroom/2-Bathroom apartment is located on the first two floors of a 5-unit apartment building in Poplar. You will absolutely love this location as it offers easy access to all of the great bars, restaurants, and shops throughout Northern Liberties and Fairmount! You will also enjoy easy access to Spring Garden Street and Delaware Ave. which makes commuting throughout the rest of the city a breeze. Enter the apartment and immediately fall in love with the modern kitchen with high-end features throughout. It includes sleek, white cabinets with brushed nickel hardware, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, four-burner electric range, microwave, and dishwasher. There is plenty of storage space throughout the cabinets and enough counterspace to prepare any meal you can imagine. There is also a tile backsplash which adds the perfect pop of character to the space and brings the entire design together. The living room is spacious and includes wide-plank flooring, tall ceilings, and large windows which allows tons of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright. This floor also includes a full-sized washer and dryer just off of the kitchen and a powder room for added convenience. Both bedrooms are a comfortable size and include the same wide-plank flooring that is seen in the living room. Both bedrooms are large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed and a complete bedroom set with ease! They also include ample closet space which is perfect for keeping your entire wardrobe organized. This apartment includes two full bathrooms which ensures everyone will have plenty of privacy. The bathrooms are stunning and include wide-plank flooring, modern vanities with plenty of storage, and an incredible tile surround that extends along the perimeter of both bathrooms. The first bathroom has an elegant shower stall while the second bathroom has a full-sized bathtub/shower. Water is included in rent. Tenants are responsible for electric, gas (if applicable), and cable/internet. Please send number thank you.

title: Luxury furnished 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms for rent!
description:

Don’t miss your opportunity to call this large 4 bed 2 bath with tons of character your new home! When you walk in your greeted with a wide-open living/dining room, coffured ceilings, recessed lighting, original wood floors and half bath. Certainly no lack of space in this kitchen! Enjoy having coffee on your private back patio, plus, no need to bring the trash cans through the house, you can use your breezeway! The 2nd floor features 3 good sized bedrooms with an updated hall bath. On the 3rd floor you’ll find your large primary bedroom with updated ensuite bath. Beautiful beam and exposed brick detail, plus tons of closet space make this a great sanctuary. Also, enjoy beautiful nights and cocktails with friends on your large roof deck! The unfinished full basement provides plenty of room for all your storage needs with a newer washer and dryer.
